doc.line: TerminateOpera = This method informs Opera that it needs to close.
full url : e.g. http://www.google.com or file:///jci/index.html
Navigate = This method informs opera engine to navigate to a desired URL.
GoBack = This method specifies opera to go back to the previous URL
GoForward = This method specifies opera to go to the forward URL
Refresh = This method specifies opera to refres/reload the current page
This signals is sending error messages to whatever client listens
